entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
